ygData.subject: Re: Human Necromancer
ygData.msgSnippet: as long as you didnt damage your reputation with the Indigo Brotherhood (like by killing Crushbone Orcs) you can get into neriak.  as far as getting into the
ygData.messageBody:
as long as you didnt damage your reputation with the Indigo Brotherhood
(like by killing Crushbone Orcs) you can get into neriak. as far as getting
into the lodge of the dead... im not sure. ive heard the ghouls may not let
in non-humans, but there is a necro guild not far away in freeport that you
can buy spells from.


>From: rags@...
>
> Greetings Dark Brothers and sisters,
>
>I am currently in my 9th season and I am getting ready to go out and see
>the world. I am prepared to die, but wanted to know if a human necromancer
>would be welcome in Neriak or Grobb? Thank ye for your Time!
>
>Lalandra of Tunare
>
>
